data.text: @TruthBoost_ I'm looking for sources to support your posts, not your other social media platforms (which is what's only provided by the link on your page)

@TruthBoost_ This is stupid. > 90% of the population over 12 is vaccinated! Have you ever heard of “Simpson’s paradox”  Look at the rate per 100 000 which shows the true picture! This is from the very same document…. I wonder why you didn’t choose this chart? 🙄🙄 https://t.co/LviLPROmaV
